dcterms:description: The Argoverse Motion Forecasting dataset includes training, validation, and testing subsets, consisting of 205942 training samples, 39472 validation samples, and 78143 samples. Each sample has a length of 5 seconds, with an observation window of 2 seconds and a prediction window of 3 seconds, including labels for agents and a global map from Pittsburgh and Miami.
dcterms:title: Argoverse Motion Forecasting Dataset
